src_text: Sehlopha se sa ditona se letet we gore se kopane le bakgathatema ka moka go thu a go bu et a sekeng boitsetsepelo kabong ya naga ya mohlagase le go rulaganya magato ao a ka latelwago goya pele mola ka go le lengwe ba netefat a gore badiri i le balefalekgetho ba itemogela ditlamorago t e nyenyane kudu t a ikonomi Maloka a go bouta Kabinete e lebogi a maAfrika Borwa ka moka, kudukudu diketekete t a bafsa le bao ba tla bego ba bouta lekga la mathomothomo, bao ba kgathilego tema boingwadi ong bja mafelelo bja mafelelo a beke ka la 26 le 27 Pherekgong 2019 pele ga ge naga ye e ka swara dikgetho t a yona t a boselela t a mmu o wa temokrasi t a boset haba le t a profense ka la 8 Mopitlo 2012.
trg_text: To address the recent situation, President Ramaphosa has appointed a Special Cabinet Committee on Eskom led by the Deputy President and comprising the Ministers of Public Enterprises; Energy; Finance; Transport; Intelligence and Polic This committee will deal with matters of Eskom daily and deliver daily reports to the President on what actions need to be taken to secure energy suppl The team is expected to meet with all stakeholders to help restore stability to the grid and chart a way forward whilst ensuring that there is minimal economic cost to the consumer and taxpayers Right to vote Cabinet congratulates all South Africans, especially thousands of young and first-time voters, who participated in the last voter registration weekend on 26 and 27 January 2019 before the country holds its sixth democratic national and provincial elections on 8 May 2019.

src_text: Kabinete e dira boipilet o bakgething ka moka bao ba nago le maloka a go kgetha go diri a ditokelo t a bona ka mikarabelo ebile e dira boipilet o go maAfrika Borwa ka moka bao gabjale ba sa kago ba ingwadi a go kgetha, go dira bjalo kua dikantorong t a Khomi ene ya go Ikema ya Dikgetho (IEC) t eo di but wego nageng ka bophar O ka lekodi i a gape seemo sa gago sa boingwadi o ka go romela SMS ya nomoro ya gago ya pasa go 32810 (SMS ye tee e bit a R) goba o ka hloma sediri wa sa app sa mahala sa IEC sellathekeng sa gago wa se
trg_text: Cabinet calls on all eligible voters to exercise their right responsibly and appeals to South Africans who have not yet registered to vote, to do so at Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) offices which are open around the countr You can also check your voter registration status by sending an SMS with your ID number to 32810 (R per SMS) or install the IEC s free mobile app for voters and use it to check your registration detail Since the birth of our democracy, we have built a thriving constitutional democracy with institutions that ensure our basic rights and freedom Furthermore, programmes have been implemented to structurally transform the economy and address our many socio-economic challenge The upcoming elections are an opportunity for a new generation of young South Africans to exercise their right to vote, and have a say in their future and that of our country Total oil and gas discovery

src_text: Afrika Borwa e nale methopo yeo e tshephi ago kudu ya difaki t e bilione ye tee le 60 tcf (trilione ye tee ya naokubiki) goba difaki t e 11 bilione t a go lekana le gase ya kgole le lebop Kabinete e retile temogo ye ya kgole le mabopo ya methopo ya gase ka khamphani ya oli ebago Total yeo e ka bago le bilione ye tee ya difaki t a methopo ye, yeo e ka hlatlo et ago kabo ya oli le ya gase godimodim Temogo ye e utolot we ke khamphani ye morago ga go bora ba phuruphut a kgonagalo ya dirafsa kua Brulpadda molapong wa Outeniqua, bokgole bja dikhilomithara t e 175 kgole le lebopo la Afrika Borwa Kopanokgothakgothe ya bo 32 ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU) Kabinete e lebogi a Mopresidente Ramaphosa ge a thwet we bjalo ka Modulasetulo wa AU go thoma ka 2020.

src_text: Morero wo o fane ka monyetla wa go lebeledi i a le go rarolla mabakatheo a go hlola dit habe o t a kgapelet o mo Afrik Afrika Borwa e romet e Lengwalo la yona la go laet a Thekgo ya Kwano ya Lefelo la Kontinente ya Afrika la Kgwebi ano ya hloka mellwane (AfCFTA) ka nako ya samit Ditaba t eo go bolet wego ka t ona di akaret a mpshafat o ya mafapha le thekgo ya dit helete ya setheo se sa kontinente; Khut o le T hirelet ego mo Kontinenteng; dikgatelopele t a go amana le AfCFTA; le ditheri ano t a kwano ye mpsha ya lekoko magareng ga dinaga t a Afrika, t a dinaga t eo di hlabologago t a lewatle la Carribbean le la Pacific le Kopano ya Yuropa morago ga ngwaga wa 2024.
trg_text: South Africa submitted its Instrument of Ratification of the Agreement on the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) during the summi Issues deliberated on included the institutional reform and financing of the continental body; Peace and Security on the Continent; developments related to the AfCFTA; and negotiations for a new cooperation agreement between the African, Caribbean and Pacific developing countries and the European Union Post-2020.

src_text: Mo gare ga ngwaga wo, Mopresidente Ramaphosa o letet we gape go t ea maemo a bodulasetulo bja Komiti ya Dihlogo t a Dinaga t a Afrika le t a Mebu o mabapi le Phetogo ya Leratadima (CAHOSCC).
trg_text: During the course of this year, President Ramaphosa is also expected to take chairship of the meeting of the Committee of African Heads of State and Government on Climate Change (CAHOSCC).

src_text: CAHOSCC e hlomilwe ka 2009 ke Kgothakgothe ya AU ya Dihlogo t a Dinaga le t a Mebu o go eta pele Boemo bjo Swanago bja Afrika go t a Phetogo ya Leratadima le ditheri anong t a bolefase t a phetogo ya leratadim Nakong ya ge Mopresidente Ramaphosa a t welapele ka maemo a gagwe a bodulasetulo, o tla
trg_text: CAHOSCC was established in 2009 by the AU Assembly of Heads of State and Government to lead the African Common Position on Climate Change and in global climate change negotiation
